com.valentine.esp.bluetooth

Interface IVR_BluetoothWrapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VR_BluetoothLEWrapper, VR_BluetoothSPPWrapper, VR_BluetoothWrapper

    public interface IVR_BluetoothWrapper
    Interface to be implemented by classes that want to function as a Bluetooth Wrapper, ex. VR_BluetoothLEWrapper, and VR_BluetoothSPPWrapper.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns if there is a Bluetooth connection.
      void sendPacket(ESPPacket packet)
      Send a ESPPacket to the PacketQueue, to be written to the BluetoothDevice.
      int startAsync()
      Asynchronously attempts a Bluetooth connection.
      boolean startSync()
      Synchronously attempts a Bluetooth connection.
      void stopAsync()
      Asynchronously attempts to close a Bluetooth connection.
      boolean stopSync()
      Synchronously attempts to close a Bluetooth connection.

    • Method Detail

      • startSync

        boolean startSync()
        Synchronously attempts a Bluetooth connection.

        DO NOT CALL ON THE UI THREAD.
        Returns:
        True if connection was established, false otherwise.

      • startAsync

        int startAsync()
        Asynchronously attempts a Bluetooth connection.
        Returns:
        Int indicating the result of the connection attempt. Valid return values = { ValentineClient.RESULT_OF_CONNECTION_EVENT_FAILED_NO_DEVICE, ValentineClient.RESULT_OF_CONNECTION_EVENT_NO_CONNECTION_ATTEMPT, ValentineClient.RESULT_OF_CONNECTION_EVENT_FAILED_LE_NOT_SUPPORTED, ValentineClient.RESULT_OF_CONNECTION_EVENT_FAILED_NO_CALLBACK, ValentineClient.RESULT_OF_CONNECTION_EVENT_FAILED_UNSUPPORTED_CONNTYPE, ValentineClient.RESULT_OF_CONNECTION_EVENT_CONNECTING, ValentineClient.RESULT_OF_CONNECTION_EVENT_CONNECTING_DELAY }

      • stopSync

        boolean stopSync()
        Synchronously attempts to close a Bluetooth connection.
        Returns:
        True if connection was terminated, false otherwise.

      • stopAsync

        void stopAsync()
        Asynchronously attempts to close a Bluetooth connection.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns if there is a Bluetooth connection.
        Returns:
        True if there if connected to a V1Connection false, otherwise.

      • sendPacket

        void sendPacket(ESPPacket packet)
        Send a ESPPacket to the PacketQueue, to be written to the BluetoothDevice.
        Parameters:
        packet - The ESPPacket to be queued.
